title: Dana Pensiun Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jateng Sell Shares of PT Asuransi Digital Bersama Tbk
body: Dana Pensiun Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jateng sold 500,000 shares of PT Asuransi Digital Bersama Tbk (YOII.JK) on January 9, 2026, at IDR 112 per share. This transaction reduces their holding from 291,968,700 shares to 291,468,700 shares, a decrease of 500,000 shares. The stated purpose is investment. This represents a minor adjustment in their stake in the company.
